commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You're here! Welcome to Uchiura!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So this is Uchiura! I've seen it so many times in my dreams! The sky is blue! The sea is beautiful! Oh, I'm getting so emotional!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Ahaha, c'mon, that's an exaggeration.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh, it is NOT! You have no idea how long I've waited for this day to come!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You must have really wanted to come here.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I sure did!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Look at you, getting all giddy over this. You're such a kid.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're one to talk. What's with that pile of luggage at your feet? You know we're not going overseas, right?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: G-Girls always pack a lot!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But we're all girls here, and you're the only one with a whole pile of luggage.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Argh! Whatever! Who cares!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you sure it's okay for all of us to stay with you guys?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It's no problem at all! Both my family's hotel and Chika-chi's ryokan inn have vacancies, and our families are all supportive of our cause.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you. I'll help out with anything you need when we have some downtime.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You know that's just asking us to use you for free labor, right? Hahaha! Anyway, we don't wanna keep everyone else waiting, so let's get going.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: So that's what I have... What do you think?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! This is great!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I can picture Aqours singing this so clearly in my mind! It's so awesome!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I totally know what you mean. I could picture it, too!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It fits our slogan perfectly. I don't think anything could top this.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Yes, this is even more incredible than I imagined. It's amazing you managed to write this in so little time.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Did you hear that? Sounds like everyone loves it.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Thank goodness. I was so nervous thinking you all might have had a different vision for it.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You had nothing to worry about.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right! I'd convince every last one of you to go along with it if you didn't like it!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Uh, but everyone does like it.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Right, so then we're all okay with using this song for the promo video?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: In that case, let's get filming. I'll be in charge of the camera work.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Lots of people are going to be watching, so be sure you get all our good sides.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Be sure to record the soaring of the fallen angel's wings in the scriptures of the apocalypse, little demon.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: And where exactly are you gonna fly off to, zura?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Um, so what do we need to do for this?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well generally, I'll just have you all go about your work as usual. Afterward, I'll interview you all one by one. Sound good?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: That's so efficient! We can work and film at the same time. So what sort of things will you be asking us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Isn't it obvious? I'll be asking you all what your dreams are!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Naturally.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Well then, shall we get started? There is quite a lot that needs to be done.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: These are the types of merchandise Kanata and I are thinking of.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I hope you're looking forward to it! Ooh, that sounded good.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Those are some awesome ideas. I kinda want some myself.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Everyone, do stop by and pick some up when you come to the event.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Please and thank you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Now, can I ask the two of you what your dreams are?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: My dream is to become a school idol who can spread the love! I would like the world to become a place where everyone can spread their own love for things far and wide!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I understand that it's quite an ambitious goal, but that is exactly why I want to try my very hardest.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can tell how passionate you are about this. What about your dream, Kanata?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: My dream is to be on stage a whole bunch.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm at my most self-indulgent when I'm a school idol. I want to have lots of fun with everyone, draw from their energy, and make it my own!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We're definitely gonna make that dream come true! Next up will be Ayumu and Riko. How excited are you for the School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I just heard the new song Riko wrote, so I'm even more fired up than before!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, Riko's song was really amazing! Riko was the one who suggested making this new song.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You don't need to talk me up that much, girls...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But, um, yes. I asked everyone to let me write our new song this time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You already had a song you wanted to write in mind, right?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yes. I wrote a song about all the things I want to tell everyone right now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's a really great song, so I hope you'll all be looking forward to it! One more question. Do you have any dreams you hope will come true at the School Idol Festival?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, my dream is simply to stand on the stage.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You see, because...we have someone who's always supporting us behind the scenes. She works really hard every day because she loves school idols and wants to cheer them all on.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I feel like no matter what it is, I can put in a lot of effort if it means making her happy. I'm having so much fun lately too! So I want everyone to see us on stage.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: My dream is to give a performance that will support those who have lost hope or are worn out from the fight for their dreams. I want to help them find their passion again.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I've struggled and run away from my dreams in the past before too.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: But then Chika and You were there to grab me by the hand and pull me back onto my feet. I don't think I would be where I am today without them.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: And now I have all of Aqours by my side. But not just them. I have everyone from 's and Nijigasaki by my side too. I'm not alone anymore. I have people cheering me on.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Everyone has always helped support me, so I want to do the same for others. I want to help them with their dreams too. That's what I hope to convey.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you both for your beautiful messages! Let's make those dreams come true!

commands.speaker: Ayumu, Riko
commands.line: Yeah!
